instruction: Please summarize the findings from the blog post regarding the performance of Global Gateway Cities in the real estate market compared to other major cities.
output: The blog post examines the performance of Global Gateway Cities, including London, New York, and Tokyo, in the real estate market compared to other major cities. The study found that while these cities provided higher capital growth, they also had lower income returns than other major cities. However, when adjusting for country effects, Global Gateway Cities tended to outperform, although with higher volatility. Overall, there was no clear pattern in terms of total return during the sample period, but the ability to define custom market segmentations can reveal key insights into the performance characteristics of larger metro areas.
